error.description: A generic error occurred in the backend.

validation_error.description: The data sent is invalid or missing.

authentication_error.description: Authentication failed or is required to access the resource.

authorization_error.description: You do not have the necessary permissions to access this resource.

not_found_error.description: The requested resource was not found in the backend.

user_not_found.description: The user entered does not exist.
